entry.data:
SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS
NEAR STEADY TEMPERATURE IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

SHOWERS LIKELY WITH A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE MID 70S
EAST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
EAST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH IN THE EVENING, BECOMING LIGHT AND VARIABLE
CHANCE OF RAIN 60 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 70S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH IN THE AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CALM WINDS, BECOMING SOUTH AROUND 5 MPH AFTER MIDNIGHT

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 80S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 80S
LOWS IN THE MID 60S

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE LOWER 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS AROUND 80
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT
